pe_dir.description: Absolute path to the directory containing the unpacked PE tarball we are going to install

pe_conf_file.description: Absolute path to the pe.conf file to be used during installation (optional)

non_interactive.description: Whether to add the -y (non-interactive mode) flag

debug_logging.description: Whether to add the -D debug flag

prep_install.description: Whether to add the -p flag which preps an installation without running the full installer
